long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReVisit is a simple browser extension to ‘bookmark’ articles you would like to read later.

ReVisit will group the articles into relevant categories e.g. Health, Business, Entertainment etc.
and will summarize the key essence of the article in 3 to 5 crisp bullet points.

Every morning we will deliver an easy-to-read newsletter into your inbox for quick consumption.

Reduce time spent on understanding the key essence of articles and get summarized information quickly.
